posts.post_content:
Damnation, Standard is calling. We need you.  
  
This is one of the best cards ever printed, hands down. I've always been a big fan of black, so when the word of a TRUE black Wrath came to me, I almost died of happiness.  
  
Seriously, this needs to be reprinted. If not in Rise of the Eldrazi, then at LEAST in Scars of Mirrodin.
